user_query: I want to surprise my family with a weekend getaway. Find me the best hotel deals in Miami Beach and provide me with a list of popular tourist attractions in the area. Also, fetch the current weather forecast for the weekend to help me plan outdoor activities.

TaskList.description: Search for the best hotel deals in Miami Beach for the upcoming weekend.
Gather a list of popular tourist attractions in Miami Beach.
Fetch the current weather forecast for Miami Beach for the weekend.
